data.title: Harry Towb
data.text:
Born: 27-Jul-1925

Birthplace: Larne, County Antrim, Northern Ireland

Died: 24-Jul-2009

Location of death: London, England

Cause of death: Cancer - unspecified

Gender: Male

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: Northern Ireland

Executive summary: Northern Irish stage and film actor

Wife: Diana Hoddinott (actress, m. 1965, until his death, one daughter, two sons)

Daughter: Emily

Son: Daniel

Son: Joshua

High School: Finiston School and Technical College, Belfast

Russian Ancestry Paternal

FILMOGRAPHY AS ACTOR

Conspiracy of Silence (15-May-2003)

The Most Fertile Man in Ireland (1999)

Moll Flanders (14-Jun-1996) · Magistrate

The Camomile Lawn (5-Mar-1992)

Lamb (6-Nov-1986)

If Tomorrow Comes (16-Mar-1986)

Lassiter (17-Feb-1984)

Rosie Dixon: Night Nurse (Feb-1978)

Barry Lyndon (18-Dec-1975) · Supporting Cast

The Girl from Petrovka (22-Aug-1974)

Digby, the Biggest Dog in the World (Dec-1973)

Carry On at Your Convenience (1971)

The Bliss of Mrs. Blossom (11-Sep-1968)

Prudence and the Pill (23-May-1968)

30 Is a Dangerous Age, Cynthia (4-Mar-1968)

All Neat in Black Stockings (1968)

The Blue Max (21-Jun-1966)

All Night Long (6-Feb-1962) · Phales

Eyewitness (14-Aug-1956)

Above Us the Waves (8-Aug-1955)

A Prize of Gold (17-Apr-1955)

The Time of His Life (1955)

The Sleeping Tiger (21-Jun-1954)
